snippet: Patrick J. Foye, the executive director of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, said that Gov. Chris Christie’s top appointee at the agency came to his office more than once to ask that the lanes be closed....
abstract: Patrick J Foye, Port Authority of New York and New Jersey executive director, testifies in trial of Bill Baroni and Bridget Anne Kelly, who are charged in George Washington Bridge lane-closure scandal; claims he was pressured by Baroni to re-close lanes after they were opened, saying issue was 'important to Trenton.'

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and NOAH REMNICK

lead_paragraph: Patrick J. Foye, the executive director of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, said that Gov. Chris Christie’s top appointee at the agency came to his office more than once to ask that the lanes be closed.

headline.main: Port Authority Chief Testifies Christie Ally Pressured Him to Reclose Lanes to Bridge
headline.print_headline: Port Authority Chief Testifies Christie Ally Pressured Him to Reclose Lanes to Bridge

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
